title: (x) type in Aveno brochure/magazine - TheMix, TheSerif {Yves}
content:
I have another, this was from a 2002 Aveno brochure/magazine, over 100 pages. I’d like to know what font this is, but also see what you all like as far as semi-serifs go, especially anything with a similar feel to this.

Thanks
